title: Gov. Greg Abbott of Texas May Challenge Schooling of Migrant Children - The New York Times
content:
1. Gov. Greg Abbott of Texas May Challenge Schooling of Migrant Children  The New York Times
  2. Gov. Abbott challenging education funds for undocumented students in Texas schools  FOX 4 Dallas-Fort Worth
  3. Gov. Abbott says Texas could challenge SCOTUS case requiring states to educate all kids  KHOU 11
  4. Editorial: Abbott’s plan to slam school door on undocumented kids is heartless — and dumb.  Houston Chronicle
  5. Greg Abbott on Plyler v. Doe: Feds should pay to educate undocumented students  The Texas Tribune
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Gov. Greg Abbott may target a 1982 Supreme Court ruling that requires schools to educate undocumented children. Some conservatives see an opening for a fresh look at old precedents.
